welcome.title: What to watch? üçø
welcome.subtitle: Hey there! Tell me what you'd like to watch and I'll find you the best recommendations!
welcome.description: Be as vague or specific as you want! Mention actors, genres, time periods, moods... Our artificial intelligence will analyze your request to suggest personalized content just for you.
welcome.placeholder: Ex: A movie or TV show with Jennifer Aniston as the lead actress, late 90s
